scripts.build:backend: npm run build -w graphql -w lambdas -w cdk
scripts.deploy: npm run build -ws --if-present && npm run synth -w cdk && npm run deploy -w cdk
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run build:backend && npm run synth:backend -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend -w cdk
scripts.deploy:backend:alpha: npm run build:backend && npm run synth:backend:alpha -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend:alpha -w cdk
scripts.deploy:backend:prod: npm run build:backend && npm run synth:backend:prod -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend:prod -w cdk
scripts.deploy:cdk: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth -w cdk && npm run deploy -w cdk
scripts.deploy:cdk:backend: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend -w cdk
scripts.deploy:cdk:backend:alpha: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend:alpha -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend:alpha -w cdk
scripts.deploy:cdk:backend:prod: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend:prod -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend:prod -w cdk
scripts.deploy:cdk:frontend: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:frontend -w cdk && npm run deploy:frontend -w cdk
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build -w graphql -w frontend -w cdk && npm run synth:frontend -w cdk && npm run deploy:frontend -w cdk
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build -ws --if-present && npm run synth:prod -w cdk && npm run deploy:prod -w cdk
scripts.diff: npm run build -ws --if-present && npm run synth -w cdk && npm run diff -w cdk
scripts.diff:backend: npm run build:backend && npm run synth:backend -w cdk && npm run diff:backend -w cdk
scripts.diff:backend:alpha: npm run build:backend && npm run synth:backend:alpha -w cdk && npm run diff:backend:alpha -w cdk
scripts.diff:backend:prod: npm run build:backend && npm run synth:backend:prod -w cdk && npm run diff:backend:prod -w cdk
scripts.diff:cdk: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth -w cdk && npm run diff -w cdk
scripts.diff:cdk:backend: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend -w cdk && npm run diff:backend -w cdk
scripts.diff:cdk:backend:alpha: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend:alpha -w cdk && npm run diff:backend:alpha -w cdk
scripts.diff:cdk:backend:prod: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend:prod -w cdk && npm run diff:backend:prod -w cdk
scripts.diff:cdk:frontend: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:frontend -w cdk && npm run diff:frontend -w cdk
scripts.diff:frontend: npm run build -w graphql -w frontend -w cdk && npm run synth:frontend -w cdk && npm run diff:frontend -w cdk
